desc: Business communication is the process of sharing information between people within and outside a company. Effective business communication is how employees and management interact to reach organizational goals.

This course is for beginner students who are familiar with the Korean alphabet, Hangeul. Through this course students will learn the skills essential for daily interactions with Koreans while living in Korea.
